---

A terminal text editor made with the textual

![Open editor](./docs/assets/example.svg)

> In development

## Installation

``` shell
pipx install gole
```

## Usage

``` shell
gole file.py
```

## Alternative

- [textual-code](https://pypi.org/project/textual-code/)
